Class NetworkSystems

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BulkResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>, Resources<NetworkSystemRestRep>, TaskResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>, TopLevelResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>

    public class NetworkSystems
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>
implements TopLevelResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>, TaskResources<NetworkSystemRestRep>
    Network Systems resources.

    Base URL: /vdc/network-systems

      • activateSanZones

        public Task<NetworkSystemRestRep> activateSanZones(java.net.URI id,
                                          java.lang.String fabric,
                                          SanZones input)
        Activates the current active zoneset of the fabric. This API assumes an active zoneset already exists. If the active zoneset became empty, this API deactivates it.

        API Call: POST /activate

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the network system.
        fabric - the name of the fabric.
        input - the SAN zones configuration.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

        API Call: GET [?fabric-id={fabric}]

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the network system.
        fabric - the name of the fabric, or null if there is no fabric.
        Returns:
        the list of WWN Aliases.
